translations: 旅馆侍者，旅馆服务员（等于 bellboy）

sentences.sentence: The bellhops moved silently and instantly and efficiently.
sentences.translation: 宾馆侍者安静伶俐高效地来回忙碌着。

sentences.sentence: When they check you into this hotel, one of the bellhops bends you over and looks up your works, just to make sure you're not carrying anything.
sentences.translation: 当他们让你进入旅馆（指监狱）时，其中某个侍者（指守卫）会贴身检查，以确定不能夹带任何东西。
